integration_patterns: Data streaming between cloud services and health records

evidence.claim: MDea utilizes AWS for hosting and data storage solutions.
The company implements FHIR standards for interoperable healthcare applications.
HIPAA compliance is highlighted in their security documentation, emphasizing data privacy and protection.
Integration with EHR systems to facilitate real-time data updates and retrieval.
X12 transaction sets are employed for billing and insurance processes within their solutions.

icp.icp_reason: MDea has a focus on HIPAA compliant data exchanges and utilizes X12 transaction sets.
